entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:57 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
